Detailed Description

Base class for an MC2 Component.

void Component::gotoWork (  ISABThreadInitialize &  init  ) 
 

Handles user interaction via stdin/stdout, calls handleCommand when appropriate, and waits for all threads to terminate after shutdown.

Should be called by main() after creation and start of the Component.

Parameters:
init Reference to the program's ISABThreadInitialize

virtual int Component::handleCommand (  const char *  input  )  [virtual]
 

Handle a command from the user.

Parameters:
input Pointer to string with the command
Returns:
Integer reporting what happened; 1: error ocurred 1: everything ok, -1: quit now

Reimplemented in CommunicationModule, ExtServiceModule, Module, TileModule, UserModule, and PTServer.

virtual void Component::parseCommandLine (   )  throw ( ComponentException ) [virtual]

int Component::splitCommand (  vector< MC2String > &  result,
const char *  input
)  [static, protected]
 

Splits a string into a vector of strings using ' ' as separator Handles quotes to some degree.

Parameters:
result A string for each part of the command, like argv.
input Input from command line as in handleCommand.
Returns:
"argc"
